metadata.description: Relation model for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857
metadata.changes: Refinement 2025-11-26: Enhanced evidence links, added relationship visualization URLs

control_relations.relation_description: Peter Faucitt controls Regima Skin Savings Account, used in systematic emptying
Peter Faucitt controls Villa Via Savings Account, used in systematic emptying
Peter Faucitt controls Strategic Savings Account, used in systematic emptying

conspiracy_relations.description: Pete previously took revenue from Kachan by instructing people to pay into another account - same pattern as with Daniel
conspiracy_relations.significance: Pattern of theft behavior; prior bad acts
conspiracy_relations.evidence_note: Detailed evidence available in ad-res-j7 repository

financial_relations.critical_note: Revenue generated on infrastructure not owned by ORG_001

financial_relations.additional_notes: Director owns 50% of both entities and charges rent to himself
Stock adjustment reflecting disappeared stock, same type supplied by Addarory's company

financial_relations.description: ReZonance owes Daniel R1.8 million as director from his investments over the years
financial_relations.significance: Substantial director loan; motive to preserve company
financial_relations.evidence_note: Detailed evidence available in ad-res-j7 repository

financial_relations.description: RegimA Skin Treatments owes over R1M to ReZonance (as of Feb 2023)

financial_relations.evidence_note: Detailed evidence available in ad-res-j7 repository

financial_relations.relation_description: Bantjies has R70.58M debt obligation to Peter Faucitt under call option agreement

employment_relations.description: Bantjes drafted Rynette's employment offer letter and advised on notice periods

employment_relations.significance: Bantjes involved in Rynette's employment from the start

email_control_relations.additional_notes: Rynette controlled Peter's email address, allowing her to control accounts system and financial communications

email_control_relations.description: Rynette has access to and uses Pete's email account Pete@regima.com
email_control_relations.significance: Smoking gun evidence of email control
email_control_relations.evidence_note: Detailed evidence available in ad-res-j7 repository

beneficiary_relations.additional_notes: Beneficiary being attacked by trustees using trust structure

professional_correspondence_relations.additional_notes: Bernadine Wright received trial balance from Bantjes, witness to his control over financial systems
Bantjies sent trial balance to Bernadine Wright for financial statement finalization meeting

capital_extraction_relations.additional_notes: Villa Via members loan account showing R22.8M capital extraction, monthly rental income R4.4M

inter_company_loan_relations.additional_notes: SLG pays interest to RST per loan agreement
RST advances R750K to RWW for production costs

knowledge_acquisition_relations.critical_significance: Bantjies knew of criminal matters before signing confirmatory affidavit

strategic_coordination_relations.critical_significance: Settlement signed 2 days before interdict filing demonstrates premeditation

system_control_relations.description: Rynette is the subscription owner for RegimA Worldwide Distribution's Sage accounting system
